description:
This application is a HP webOS city guide to accompany you on your visit to Ireland.

It contains a regularly expanding OFFLINE database of points of interest including, bars, museums as well as tourist attractions.

With help from your GPS it will indicate the disance and direction to the nearest sight.

This application operates completely offline meaning you don't have to connect to the internet to locate the destination.

An optional link will locate the spot for you in google maps which will require an internet connection.

We hope you like it and hope you have a great visit in the emerald isle!

The author comes from Ireland and in all honesty doesn't think there is anything else worth seeing that's not on the list! Email me if you believe otherwise!

Regards,
John
versionNote: Small bug corrected in East section that resulted in incorrect item being displayed instead of item touched.
